ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator
Class DelayFunction

java.lang.Object
  ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Executable
      ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.DelayFunction

public class DelayFunction
extends Executable

represents a whole assembler function in the following format init_instructions main_instructions finalize_instrucions return_instruction

Field Summary
(package private)  Executable finalize_instrucions
          instructions used to wrap up the processing in the delay function, usually by restoring the state of the system elements as they were before invoking the delay functions
(package private)  Executable init_instructions
          instructions used to do some initializing such as storing some values of elements on stack so they may be recovered at later times, while the instructions get to utilize those required elements
(package private)  Executable main_instructions
          the main body of the delay functions, these instructions are the main contributors to the time of execution of the function
(package private)  Executable return_instruction
          RET instruction or its equivalent, for returning to the main program routine
 
Constructor Summary
DelayFunction()
           
 
Method Summary
 int length()
          how many instructions are in this function
 long time()
          how long will this function take to fully execute the sum of the times for all instruction groups and loop in the function
 java.lang.String toString()

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

init_instructions

Executable init_instructions
instructions used to do some initializing such as storing some values of elements on stack so they may be recovered at later times, while the instructions get to utilize those required elements

Executable main_instructions
the main body of the delay functions, these instructions are the main contributors to the time of execution of the function

finalize_instrucions

Executable finalize_instrucions
instructions used to wrap up the processing in the delay function, usually by restoring the state of the system elements as they were before invoking the delay functions

RET instruction or its equivalent, for returning to the main program routine

time

public long time()
how long will this function take to fully execute the sum of the times for all instruction groups and loop in the function

Specified by:

Returns:

Specified by:
